meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of a margrave.
meanings.sent1: The margravates expanded into neighboring lands.
meanings.sent2: The margravates were well-defined regions with specific rulers.
meanings.sent3: The margravates threw a party for the neighboring kingdoms.
meanings.sent4: The margravates were like puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The margravates were marked on the map with bold lines.

meanings.definition: The office or rank of a margrave.
meanings.sent1: His father held the margravates with honor and dignity.
meanings.sent2: The margravates were respected positions in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The margravates decided to have a costume party.
meanings.sent4: The margravates were like shining stars in the royal court.
meanings.sent5: The margravates were symbols of power and authority.
